Description:
Detects the creation of a new named pipe using the "mkfifo" utility

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Named Pipe Created Via Mkfifo
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/mkfifo'
